an10.192:3.1: 148 The Teaching of a Good Person
an10.192:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the principle of a good person and the principle of a bad person.
an10.192:4.3: And what is the principle of a bad person?
an10.192:4.6: This is the principle of a bad person.
an10.192:5.1: And what is the principle of a good person?
an10.192:5.4: This is the principle of a good person.”
